text:
These Spoofs Of The Accidental Prime Minister Trailer Ft Game Of Thrones & Avengers Are Too Epic To Miss
These Spoofs Of The Accidental Prime Minister Trailer Ft Game Of Thrones & Avengers Are Too Epic To Miss
How can this one be spared from becoming a butt of jokes on social media? Everything that makes waves ends up getting turned into memes, jokes and sometimes spoofs as well.
Since the time the trailer of The Accidental Prime Minister has been released, the political climate of the nation has been in a turmoil. Congress has demanded a special screening of the movie that details the political career of former Prime Minister Dr Manmohan Singh, calling it anti-Congress propaganda. Furthermore, objections have been raised to “incorrect presentation of facts” in the movie.
Screengrab
So much so, that a case has also been filed in Bihar against Anupam Kher and 14 others associated with the movie for damaging the reputation of some top bureaucrats.
Amid all this, some creative minds made spoofs of the controversial trailer of the much-in-talks movie.
This spoof of The Accidental Prime Minister featuring Game of Thrones is too epic to be missed.
Don't Miss 264 SHARES 233 SHARES 161 SHARES 4.3 K SHARES
This one with the Avengers’ twist will make you ROFL. Take a look!
The Accidental Prime Minister is set to hit the theatres on Jan 11.
title: The Accidental Prime Minister spoof:These Spoofs Of The Accidental Prime Minister Trailer Feat GoT & Avengers Are Too Epic To Miss
description: Amid all this, some creative minds made spoofs of the controversial trailer of the much-in-talks movie The Accidental Prime Minister starring Anupam Kher. Amid all this, some creative minds made spoofs of the controversial trailer of the much-in-talks movie and the one on Avengers is hilarious too.
